Name: subset_new_comb_Retail
Expression: {FILTER(TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(DESCENDANTS({STRTOMEMBER(("[SLS_MATERIAL_PLAN].[" + [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Division])) + "]")}) , 0) , ((([SLS_MATERIAL_PLAN].[SLS_MATERIAL_PLAN].[Status] <> "OBS") AND ([SLS_MATERIAL_PLAN].[SLS_MATERIAL_PLAN].[Status] <> "INA")) AND (INSTR(1 , [SLS_MATERIAL_PLAN].[SLS_MATERIAL_PLAN].[Distribution Channel] , "10" , 1) >= 1)) AND (INSTR(1 , [SLS_MATERIAL_PLAN].[SLS_MATERIAL_PLAN].[Sales Organisation Name] , [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Sales Organisation]) , 1) >= 1))}
